unnormalised: Hey Students, Ditch the Scholarship Scramble!
normalised: Hey Students, Ditch the Scholarship Scramble!

unnormalised: Tired of rummaging through notice boards like you're searching for buried treasure? Good news! EdTech's stepping up its game. Scholarship portals are now the hottest thing since piping hot biryani on a rainy day in Hyderabad.
normalised: Tired of rummaging through notice boards like you are searching for buried treasure? Good news! EdTech is stepping up its game. Scholarship portals are now the hottest thing since piping hot biryani on a rainy day in Hyderabad.

unnormalised: These online platforms are like matchmaking services, connecting deserving students like you with scholarships perfect for your needs. Think of it as your personal scholarship guru, available 24/7!
normalised: These online platforms are like matchmaking services, connecting deserving students like you with scholarships perfect for your needs. Think of it as your personal scholarship guru, available twenty four slash seven!

unnormalised: From post-matric scholarships offered by the Ministry to private fellowships from NGOs, it’s all there. Imagine finding a scholarship specifically for students from Kerala wanting to study robotics at IIT Madras!
normalised: From post-matric scholarships offered by the Ministry to private fellowships from N G O s, it is all there. Imagine finding a scholarship specifically for students from Kerala wanting to study robotics at I I T Madras!

unnormalised: These portals often have filters based on your caste, financial background, academic performance and even your intended course of study. No more feeling lost in the crowd during Onam celebrations - you’ll be specifically targeted!
normalised: These portals often have filters based on your caste, financial background, academic performance and even your intended course of study. No more feeling lost in the crowd during Onam celebrations - you will be specifically targeted!

unnormalised: Some portals even offer free resume review and application guidance!
normalised: Some portals even offer free resume review and application guidance!

unnormalised: So, ditch the paper trail and embrace the digital revolution! Start your scholarship hunt today! You might just be a few clicks away from funding your dreams.
normalised: So, ditch the paper trail and embrace the digital revolution! Start your scholarship hunt today! You might just be a few clicks away from funding your dreams.
